name: Neon Shadow
description: Neon Shadow is a fast paced Cyber Punk FPS inspired by classic shooters.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or Amd 1.5 GHZ or above Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel onboard graphics card or above DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Sound Blaster
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or Amd 1.5 GHZ or above Memory: 5 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX800 series or above DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Sound Blaster
